parameter.name: cloudDiscovery
parameter.label: Cloud Discovery
parameter.description: Use Cloud Discovery Service to get all in Tapo App registered devices. Includes device name. IP address and encryption have to be set manually if device is not found via udpDiscovery

parameter.name: udpDiscovery
parameter.label: UDP Discovery
parameter.description: Use UDP Discovery Service to discover online devices in the local network. Includes encryption and IP address

parameter.name: onlyLocalOnlineDevices
parameter.label: Discover Only Online Devices
parameter.description: Uses Cloud and UDP Discovery to get more information but will only discover online devices via UDP

parameter.name: broadcastAddress
parameter.label: Broadcast Address
parameter.description: Broadcast address UDP requests are sent to. Change it to the broadcast address of your IP range (e.g. '192.168.1.255') if you have problems with default (255.255.255.255)
